info.title: Blogger API
info.description: API for access to the data within Blogger.

get.description: Gets one blog and user info pair by blogId and userId.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog to get.

parameters.name: maxPosts
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to pull back with the blog.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose blogs are to be fetched. Either the word 'self' (sans quote marks) or the user's profile identifier.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog to get.

parameters.name: maxPosts
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to pull back with the blog.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level with which to view the blog. Note that some fields require elevated access.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the blog to retrieve.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level with which to view the blog. Note that some fields require elevated access.

get.description: Retrieves a list of blogs, possibly filtered.

parameters.name: fetchUserInfo
parameters.description: Whether the response is a list of blogs with per-user information instead of just blogs.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: User access types for blogs to include in the results, e.g. AUTHOR will return blogs where the user has author level access. If no roles are specified, defaults to ADMIN and AUTHOR roles.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Blog statuses to include in the result (default: Live blogs only). Note that ADMIN access is required to view deleted blogs.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose blogs are to be fetched. Either the word 'self' (sans quote marks) or the user's profile identifier.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level with which to view the blogs. Note that some fields require elevated access.

post.description: Marks a comment as not spam.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The ID of the comment to mark as not spam.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the Post.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The ID of the comment to delete.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the Post.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to containing the comment.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The ID of the comment to get.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to fetch posts from.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level for the requested comment (default: READER). Note that some comments will require elevated permissions, for example comments where the parent posts which is in a draft state, or comments that are pending moderation.

get.description: Retrieves the comments for a post, possibly filtered.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to fetch comments from.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Latest date of comment to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

parameters.name: fetchBodies
parameters.description: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Continuation token if request is paged.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: ID of the post to fetch posts from.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Earliest date of comment to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

get.description: Retrieves the comments for a blog, across all posts, possibly filtered.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to fetch comments from.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Latest date of comment to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

parameters.name: fetchBodies
parameters.description: Whether the body content of the comments is included.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to include in the result.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Continuation token if request is paged.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Earliest date of comment to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The ID of the comment to mark as spam.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the Post.

post.description: Removes the content of a comment.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The ID of the comment to delete content from.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the Post.

get.description: Retrieve pageview stats for a Blog.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog to get.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: The ID of the Page.

get.description: Gets one blog page by ID.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog containing the page.

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: The ID of the page to get.

patch.description: Update a page. This method supports patch semantics.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: The ID of the Page.

parameters.name: publish
parameters.description: Whether a publish action should be performed when the page is updated (default: false).

parameters.name: revert
parameters.description: Whether a revert action should be performed when the page is updated (default: false).

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: The ID of the Page.

parameters.name: publish
parameters.description: Whether a publish action should be performed when the page is updated (default: false).

parameters.name: revert
parameters.description: Whether a revert action should be performed when the page is updated (default: false).

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to add the page to.

parameters.name: isDraft
parameters.description: Whether to create the page as a draft (default: false).

get.description: Retrieves the pages for a blog, optionally including non-LIVE statuses.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to fetch Pages from.

parameters.name: fetchBodies
parameters.description: Whether to retrieve the Page bodies.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of Pages to fetch.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Continuation token if the request is paged.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog.

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: The ID of the page.

post.description: Revert a published or scheduled page to draft state.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog.

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: The ID of the page.

get.description: Gets one post and user info pair, by post ID and user ID. The post user info contains per-user information about the post, such as access rights, specific to the user.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the blog.

parameters.name: maxComments
parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to pull back on a post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the post to get.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user for the per-user information to be fetched. Either the word 'self' (sans quote marks) or the user's profile identifier.

get.description: Retrieves a list of post and post user info pairs, possibly filtered. The post user info contains per-user information about the post, such as access rights, specific to the user.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to fetch posts from.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Latest post date to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

parameters.name: fetchBodies
parameters.description: Whether the body content of posts is included. Default is false.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of labels to search for.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to fetch.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort order applied to search results. Default is published.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Continuation token if the request is paged.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Earliest post date to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user for the per-user information to be fetched. Either the word 'self' (sans quote marks) or the user's profile identifier.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the Post.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to fetch the post from.

parameters.name: fetchBody
parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included (default: true). This should be set to false when the post bodies are not required, to help minimize traffic.

parameters.name: fetchImages
parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included (default: false).

parameters.name: maxComments
parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to pull back on a post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the post

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

patch.description: Update a post. This method supports patch semantics.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: fetchBody
parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included with the result (default: true).

parameters.name: fetchImages
parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included in the returned result (default: false).

parameters.name: maxComments
parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to retrieve with the returned post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the Post.

parameters.name: publish
parameters.description: Whether a publish action should be performed when the post is updated (default: false).

parameters.name: revert
parameters.description: Whether a revert action should be performed when the post is updated (default: false).

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: fetchBody
parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included with the result (default: true).

parameters.name: fetchImages
parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included in the returned result (default: false).

parameters.name: maxComments
parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to retrieve with the returned post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the Post.

parameters.name: publish
parameters.description: Whether a publish action should be performed when the post is updated (default: false).

parameters.name: revert
parameters.description: Whether a revert action should be performed when the post is updated (default: false).

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to fetch the post from.

parameters.name: maxComments
parameters.description: Maximum number of comments to pull back on a post.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path of the Post to retrieve.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require elevated access.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to add the post to.

parameters.name: fetchBody
parameters.description: Whether the body content of the post is included with the result (default: true).

parameters.name: fetchImages
parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included in the returned result (default: false).

parameters.name: isDraft
parameters.description: Whether to create the post as a draft (default: false).

get.description: Retrieves a list of posts, possibly filtered.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to fetch posts from.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Latest post date to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

parameters.name: fetchBodies
parameters.description: Whether the body content of posts is included (default: true). This should be set to false when the post bodies are not required, to help minimize traffic.

parameters.name: fetchImages
parameters.description: Whether image URL metadata for each post is included.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of labels to search for.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to fetch.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort search results

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Continuation token if the request is paged.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Earliest post date to fetch, a date-time with RFC 3339 formatting.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Statuses to include in the results.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Access level with which to view the returned result. Note that some fields require escalated access.

post.description: Publishes a draft post, optionally at the specific time of the given publishDate parameter.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the Post.

parameters.name: publishDate
parameters.description: Optional date and time to schedule the publishing of the Blog. If no publishDate parameter is given, the post is either published at the a previously saved schedule date (if present), or the current time. If a future date is given, the post will be scheduled to be published.

post.description: Revert a published or scheduled post to draft state.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: The ID of the Blog.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: The ID of the Post.

parameters.name: blogId
parameters.description: ID of the blog to fetch the post from.

parameters.name: fetchBodies
parameters.description: Whether the body content of posts is included (default: true). This should be set to false when the post bodies are not required, to help minimize traffic.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort search results

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query terms to search this blog for matching posts.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user to get.

customMetaData.description: The JSON custom meta-data for the Blog

description.description: The description of this blog. This is displayed underneath the title.

kind.description: The kind of this entry. Always blogger#blog

locale.description: The locale this Blog is set to.

country.description: The country this blog's locale is set to.

language.description: The language this blog is authored in.

variant.description: The language variant this blog is authored in.

name.description: The name of this blog. This is displayed as the title.

pages.description: The container of pages in this blog.

selfLink.description: The URL of the container for pages in this blog.

totalItems.description: The count of pages in this blog.

posts.description: The container of posts in this blog.

items.description: The List of Posts for this Blog.

selfLink.description: The URL of the container for posts in this blog.

totalItems.description: The count of posts in this blog.

published.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this blog was published.

selfLink.description: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

updated.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this blog was last updated.

url.description: The URL where this blog is published.

blogUserInfos.description: Admin level list of blog per-user information

items.description: The list of Blogs this user has Authorship or Admin rights over.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#blogList

hasAdminAccess.description: True if the user has Admin level access to the blog.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#blogPerUserInfo

photosAlbumKey.description: The Photo Album Key for the user when adding photos to the blog

role.description: Access permissions that the user has for the blog (ADMIN, AUTHOR, or READER).

blog_user_info.description: Information about a User for the Blog.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#blogUserInfo

id.description: The identifier of the Comment creator.

url.description: The URL of the Comment creator's Profile page.

blog.description: Data about the blog containing this comment.

id.description: The identifier of the blog containing this comment.

content.description: The actual content of the comment. May include HTML markup.

inReplyTo.description: Data about the comment this is in reply to.

id.description: The identified of the parent of this comment.

kind.description: The kind of this entry. Always blogger#comment

post.description: Data about the post containing this comment.

id.description: The identifier of the post containing this comment.

published.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this comment was published.

selfLink.description: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

status.description: The status of the comment (only populated for admin users)

updated.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this comment was last updated.

items.description: The List of Comments for a Post.

kind.description: The kind of this entry. Always blogger#commentList

nextPageToken.description: Pagination token to fetch the next page, if one exists.

prevPageToken.description: Pagination token to fetch the previous page, if one exists.

id.description: The identifier of the Page creator.

url.description: The URL of the Page creator's Profile page.

blog.description: Data about the blog containing this Page.

id.description: The identifier of the blog containing this page.

content.description: The body content of this Page, in HTML.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#page

published.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this Page was published.

selfLink.description: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

status.description: The status of the page for admin resources (either LIVE or DRAFT).

title.description: The title of this entity. This is the name displayed in the Admin user interface.

updated.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this Page was last updated.

url.description: The URL that this Page is displayed at.

items.description: The list of Pages for a Blog.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#pageList

nextPageToken.description: Pagination token to fetch the next page, if one exists.

counts.description: The container of posts in this blog.

count.description: Count of page views for the given time range

timeRange.description: Time range the given count applies to

kind.description: The kind of this entry. Always blogger#page_views

id.description: The identifier of the Post creator.

url.description: The URL of the Post creator's Profile page.

blog.description: Data about the blog containing this Post.

id.description: The identifier of the Blog that contains this Post.

content.description: The content of the Post. May contain HTML markup.

customMetaData.description: The JSON meta-data for the Post.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#post

labels.description: The list of labels this Post was tagged with.

span.description: Location's viewport span. Can be used when rendering a map preview.

published.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this Post was published.

readerComments.description: Comment control and display setting for readers of this post.

replies.description: The container of comments on this Post.

items.description: The List of Comments for this Post.

selfLink.description: The URL of the comments on this post.

totalItems.description: The count of comments on this post.

selfLink.description: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

status.description: Status of the post. Only set for admin-level requests

titleLink.description: The title link URL, similar to atom's related link.

updated.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this Post was last updated.

url.description: The URL where this Post is displayed.

items.description: The list of Posts for this Blog.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#postList

nextPageToken.description: Pagination token to fetch the next page, if one exists.

blogId.description: ID of the Blog that the post resource belongs to.

hasEditAccess.description: True if the user has Author level access to the post.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#postPerUserInfo
The kind of this entity. Always blogger#postUserInfo

post_user_info.description: Information about a User for the Post.

items.description: The list of Posts with User information for the post, for this Blog.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#postList

nextPageToken.description: Pagination token to fetch the next page, if one exists.

blogs.description: The container of blogs for this user.

selfLink.description: The URL of the Blogs for this user.

created.description: The timestamp of when this profile was created, in seconds since epoch.

kind.description: The kind of this entity. Always blogger#user

selfLink.description: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.name: key
key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.name: oauth_token
oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.name: prettyPrint
prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.name: quotaUser
quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

userIp.name: userIp
userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.
